channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 23:55 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 23:55 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 23:36 Failure to the Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District-Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 23:36 Failure to the Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District-Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
